snippet.title: Portal: Singularity Collapse ｜ Recycled Aperture Showcase
snippet.description:
(This is a reupload of the original video, as we're moving to this channel now.)

Hello everyone!
Today we're back with something fresh that we've all been working hard on for PSC. We're very excited to show the progress on the mod, and finally a video that shows the current state of our development progress.

Of course stuff is going to change, for example; as mentioned in the article, we are currently in the state of remaking pretty much every texture from scratch. 
Either way, enjoy!
